main.name: Amareya Allen-Dabney
main.description: I am an enthusiast of problem solving. I recently graduated from Prime Digital Academy with a Full-Stack Engineering Certificate
main.bio: I am a retail manager turned developer. I mainly work with ReactJS, Node and Postgres to create full stack applications. I also have an interest in learning native languages nad React Native.
main.contactmessage: If you would like to contact me about employment please contact me at.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some technologies I am familiar with:

education.description: I learned full stack using Node.js, React.js, JavaScript, Express, Postgres, MongoDB, SQL, HTML, and CSS
Courses taken towards a Communication degree and Computer Science degree.

work.title: Software Development Student
work.description: Sole Check- This app was created for sneakerhead to be able to catalog their shoes and update when they wore the shoe. On this app the user has the ability to upload new shoes, view all their shoes, update the date it was worn and delete the shoe if removed from their collection. Node, Express, React, Redux, React-redux, Redux-logger, Redux-saga, react-router-dom, Postgresql, AWS S3, Moment.js, Material UI, Sweet Alert, Passport

work.title: Direct Support Professional
work.description: Provide guidance and encouragement, through relationship building and direct interaction with vulnerable adults. Advocate for individuals in all aspects on life, and support individuals in essential living skills.

work.title: Package Unloader
work.description: Unload freight off of trucks to be transported to a different location. Maintain workflow at 100 packages an hour.

work.title: Customer Service Representative
work.description: Assist external customers with property appraisal concerns and inquiries. Utilized multiple systems and technologies. Maintain individual performance relative to inbound calls and outbound calls.

work.title: Store Manager
work.description: Coach and lead a team in delivering a quality in-store experience. Lead the team in day to day store operations, training and employee management. Maximize profit goals and drive sales. Learn all updates to our registerâ€™s operating system and train managers on new updates.

work.title: Store Manager
work.description: Complete store readiness requirements. Maintain store staff by coaching, counseling and disciplining employees as needed. Achieve financial obligations by preparing an annual budget, scheduling expenditures and analyzing variances.

testimonials.text: I had the pleasure of working with Amareya at Prime Digital Academy. She approaches problems with tenacity and persistence and patiently and clearly shares her thought process. I wholly recommend her!
